message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $10,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product offers.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  However, I can't go lower than $9,000.  This product is in high demand, and I'm confident it would benefit you greatly.
I understand your perspective on the demand, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $7,500. Can you consider this offer?
